mapper.select: SELECT a.id,a.adv_title advTitle,a.adv_pic_path advPicPath FROM live_advert a WHERE a.adv_type=0 AND a.application_type=0 AND a.adv_status=1 AND a.start_date<=now() AND a.end_date>=now() ORDER BY a.adv_order ASC

SELECT a.id,a.adv_title advTitle,a.adv_pic_path advPicPath, a.adv_source advSource,a.click_number clickNumber FROM live_advert a WHERE a.adv_type=1 AND a.application_type=0 AND a.adv_status=1 AND a.start_date<=now() AND a.end_date>=now() ORDER BY a.adv_order ASC
SELECT count(1) FROM live_advert a WHERE a.adv_type=#{advType}

SELECT a.id,a.adv_title advTitle,a.adv_desc advDesc,a.adv_type advType,a.adv_pic_path advPicPath, a.adv_source_type advSourceType,a.adv_source advSource,a.application_type applicationType, a.start_date startDate,a.end_date endDate,a.adv_status advStatus,a.adv_order advOrder, a.click_number clickNumber FROM live_advert a where a.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update live_advert adv set adv.adv_status=#{advStatus},adv.updated_date=now(),adv.updated_name=#{updatedName} WHERE adv.id=#{id}
